hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/sh # set EXCLUDE_KERNEL=ture, if you wont to skip kernel update # set ALLOW_ALPHAREPO=true when you wont to update from alpha-testing openjdkQA internal repo. Such update and testruns must be observed carefully # it is recomended to run normal update as separate step before update with ALLOW_ALPHAREPO # ALLOW_ALPHAREPO shold be run for el 6.y.z and 7.y.z only (keep it in mind # ALLOW_ALPHAREPO=true looks like not working on rhel8 export VM_J_ID=%{PLATFORM_NAME} sh %{SCRIPTS_ROOT}/jenkins/%{PROVIDER}/updateBox.sh $VM_J_ID \ "sudo EXCLUDE_KERNEL=false ALLOW_ALPHAREPO=false bash /mnt/shared/TckScripts/jenkins/%{PROVIDER}/update/update-command.sh" #"sudo dnf -y install kernel-modules-extra && sudo EXCLUDE_KERNEL=false ALLOW_ALPHAREPO=false bash /mnt/shared/TckScripts/jenkins/vagrant/update/update-command.sh" #"sudo dnf -y --enablerepo=rhel-8-buildroot upgrade libstdc++-static giflib-devel && sudo EXCLUDE_KERNEL=true ALLOW_ALPHAREPO=false bash /mnt/shared/TckScripts/jenkins/vagrant/update/update-command.sh" #"echo just repack" #"sudo dnf -y remove *photos* gnome-soft* PackageKit flatpak gnome-contac* gnome-box* gnome-w* *abrt* *clock*" #"sudo yum -y install *lcms*" #"sudo yum -y downgrade \"nss*\"" #"sudo yum -y downgrade \"nspr*\""
